column5: great report guys and awesome photos of the pike
That is awesome!!! post the video please

Love how you put this one together paul!  Im still tromatized with yesterdays outting.  its funny how this happened to so many people befor.  finaly happened to us.!  Here are a couple of picture i took with my camera.    paul lipping what seems to be a BEAST! ended up beeing a 2 lbs bass!  had to get the joker to put a smile on whitespinnerbaits face for this one!    a pair of 2.8 lbs bass! Twins caught back to back on the famous northam spinnerbaits White!  Here is another funny story.  that 4.8 im holding up regurgitated a perch that was longer than some bass we were getting.  so add a seriouse 3 to 4 ounces on that bass and shes a 4.11!  not bad HEIN?!?!  she was caught on a 5'' black sinking minnow '' GULP'' wacky style! fishing a big log in the middle of a bay!
Great fish and pics guys. The loon is cool too.
yeah Whitespinnerbait.  you should post that video.  CRUNCH CRUNCH CRUNCH!   its still playing over and over in my head like a broken record.
Attaboy Paul       Great report and nice pics Now where's the video????? Jacques
Fantastic shot of that pike inhaling the bass.The pics almost distract from the other pics of some real nice lunker LMBs. Great session you had there!
where were you fishing?
Good stuff boys. Nailed some hawgs! Hawgs got nailed! lol
Good job lads....Hey Kev......next time use Paul's camera to take pictures as the fish will be magically BIGGER
Very cool post guys. Hand bombing the pike is like the greatest act of heroism in recent memory (I don't get out much). Thanks for posting. Jim
Great catches! Even greater still with that shot of the pike! way to catch that action!
AMAZING!  Note to self, move to Hull and make friends with 24/7
awesome picture congrats nice bass
If you move to hull i will personnaly get you into these buckets!!

Finally after the unsettled weather moving through  24/7 and I got an chance to get out and do some Bassin today.  We started off working the shorelines using the Famous Northam SpinnerBaits , sure enough the bass were on the feed , first Bass of the day    I guess this loon dropped by to see what all the fuss was about...    Mid morning we moved out and starting Gulping the logs ....  Can you say Bucket Mouth...      I decided to throw on a White Big-o , First cast I get a hit = a one pound bass as it nears the boat .....Bang !!!! A 7lb pike comes out of nowhere and tries to take off with '' My '' bass   :angry:      24/7 reaches down and picks up the Long water snake .......  :wacko:      Bass Rat     The bass seem to be somewhat more active ..............Finally !!!!!   :worthy:  :worthy:
Cool, pike/bass picture. Would never think Pike would eat bass. Great job with those big bass!  MTBF
Great job getting that moment caught on film!
wow... great photo of that Pike hitting the bass...  are you saying your buddy handbombed that particular pike in too?... kewl if he did
Very cool shot.  Congrats on a great day !!
Nice hawgs!!  Cool pic with the pike.
I love the pics of the pike striking the bass.  Real nice job capturing the action.  Real nice fish too.
That's an amazing scene. That Pike must be like a mafia boss of the lake, fearless.
Excellent report.  Great Pics.  Pesky Pike eh!  Eatin you bass like that.
Beautiful Bass there! Nice going!
those are some nice looking bass. thanks for the share!
Sure did
Those are HAWGS! Congrats to you.
You guys did OK, cool photos...

Ok you and Kev are definitely kings of the water now!  That is a sweet shot, and Kev great job grabbing her out of the water!  I have seen it happen by pike and muskie but never got one on film.  Had muskies hit bobbers twice too.
Awesome! Merci!
Great pictures, got to love the pike after the free meal deal.
Thanks for sharing they are some good size Largemouth. Kenny G.
Beauty buckets.
Thats a cool deal, but, I hope you let the Pike go. It was illegally caught.

Yeah... I think everyone from Quebec is a poacher too!!!  Excellent report, pics, and fish Paul!!!  Kevin did good poaching that Pike like that!  ... and you did good catching it on film!!!  Those Pike should eat every one of those disgusting Green Trout!!!
excellent bass and photo catch!
Yep both the Bass and Pike were released.....
Wow that's amazing, nice job getting some pics of it!
Yep....  In the Video you can hear the Pike crunching on the Bass..
